JOB-POSTING-1: Join ACME Health Data Intelligence (HDI) team to build a best-in-class, cloud-native research platform for healthcare and life sciences. HDI addresses the challenge of integrating, reasoning over, and delivering actionable insights from vast, heterogeneous biomedical datasets. As a Principal Software Engineer (IC4), you will provide technical leadership and hands-on expertise in designing, implementing, and delivering scalable platform services, secure cloud networking, agentic workflows, and explainable AI integration. You’ll partner with engineering, product, and operations teams to build high-availability, compliant solutions powering next-generation research.
JOB-POSTING-2: The mission of the Applied Machine Learning team is to provide scalable data and model driven decision making solutions to the various business functions at Acme Inc. We aim to create a personalized experience for our users, by helping them discover & engage with the right products & features within Acme Inc that they might find most valuable. To accelerate progress, we are also building an accessible model development platform to democratize machine learning practices throughout the company. As we embark on this exciting journey, we are looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to join us to make this vision a reality.
JOB-POSTING-3: We are looking for a multi-vendor, multi-instrument service engineer for contract work. Exact service dates will be negotiated with minimum 1 week advanced warning. We are particularly interested in candidates with LC-MS experience. If interested, reply with a list and extent of instruments serviced along with any formal training and experience.Formal training as a service engineer or field service technician from Agilent, Waters, AB Sciex, ThermoFisher, Shimadzu, or PerkinElmer is a strong asset.
JOB-POSTING-4: XYZ College is seeking a full-time faculty member to support the teacher education associate and bachelor’s degree programs. The successful candidate will assist with the instruction and facilitation of upper- and lower-division teacher education courses, including methods courses, mild/moderate special education courses, professional seminars, classroom management, and foundational education and special education courses.
JOB-POSTING-5: The IT Business Analyst is a hybrid position with 2 days in office and 3 days remote. It is an important part of the team here at Forever Living. This position is primarily responsible for participating in the design and implementation of new software solutions, helping to define SOP’s and process improvements and deployment of existing solutions into new markets. They are focused on working with the business users to document existing As Is and To Be processes, elicit business requirements to create functional and technical specifications (where needed). This person will participate in all phases of the project (GAP analysis, training, testing phases, cutover, go-live support) as well as providing post go-live support as needed. We are looking for someone to roll their sleeves up, dig in and truly understand the system end-to-end and be instrumental in successful software deployments. Someone who is a team player and who works to deliver projects on-time with high quality.
